column1: Table 6 5: Cost details of Medihena Wewa-reservation improvement

1. Dense planting of mixed vegetation comprising Agave /Kumbuk/ Mee/ Madan/ Nelli / Durian/ Mandarin/ Orange/ Avocado/ Guava/ Mango/ Aththikka/ Wal del/ Kekuna etc. randomly mixed seedlings at 500 mm grid intervals for 2500 m2.
2. Apply mulching, organic manure, and NPK fertilizer.
3. Introduction of Bamboo, Vetiver grass, and riparian plants. The covered area is 300 m2, and there is a row of Areca nut trees.
4. Maintain for six months and continue watering for one year as required.
